about_the_game:
This expansion pack will make your hero develop even faster and double the chance of finding magic items in ruins! Duration time - 6 months (180 days)

This package includes:
  • Hero`s squad mission duration -10%
  • Chance of finding Magic Items in Ruins +100%
  • Hero experience in battles +50%
